fruits.name: Apples
fruits.description: Crisp, juicy apples that come in a variety of flavors from sweet to tart. Rich in fiber and vitamins, apples are perfect for snacking or adding to salads and desserts. Varieties: Gala, Fuji, Granny Smith, Honeycrisp, Red Delicious. Health Benefits: Great source of dietary fiber, promotes heart health, and contains antioxidants that help protect against chronic diseases.

fruits.name: Oranges
fruits.description: Refreshing, tangy, and sweet oranges packed with vitamin C. Perfect for juicing, snacking, or adding to savory and sweet dishes. Varieties: Navel, Valencia, Blood Orange, Cara Cara, Clementine. Health Benefits: Boosts immune system, promotes healthy skin, and aids in digestion.

fruits.name: Bananas
fruits.description: Creamy, sweet bananas that are convenient and nutritious. Ideal for a quick snack, smoothies, or baking. Varieties: Cavendish, Plantain, Red Banana, Lady Finger, Blue Java. Health Benefits: Rich in potassium, supports heart health, and provides quick energy.

fruits.name: Mangoes
fruits.description: Juicy, aromatic mangoes with a luscious texture and tropical sweetness. Excellent for eating fresh, in smoothies, or in savory dishes like salsas and salads. Varieties: Alphonso, Haden, Kent, Ataulfo, Tommy Atkins. Health Benefits: High in vitamin C and A, supports eye health, and boosts the immune system.

fruits.name: Grapes
fruits.description: Succulent, sweet grapes that come in a range of colors and flavors. Great for snacking, adding to cheese boards, or making wine. Varieties: Concord, Red Globe, Thompson Seedless, Cotton Candy, Moon Drops. Health Benefits: Rich in antioxidants, supports heart health, and helps reduce inflammation.
